main_text:
Objections to Stevenson’s Emotivism
5. Objections to Stevenson’s Emotivism

A number of objections have been leveled against Stevenson’s emotivism
over the years. They fall within two categories, one related to
Stevenson’s account of moral thought and metaphysics, the other to his
account of moral language.
hierarchy_title: Charles Leslie Stevenson || Objections to Stevenson’s Emotivism
